home.home_title: Empowering the next generation of STEM leaders in Bolivia
home.home_subtitle: Discover, learn and transform your future. At Chicas Waskiris we inspire girls and teenagers to explore the fascinating world of science, technology, engineering and mathematics (STEM).
home.home_about_description: We believe in the power of curiosity, innovation and collaboration to build a more inclusive, creative and brave community. Here, every girl has the opportunity to develop new skills, connect with mentors and discover her potential to change the world.
home.home_stem_description: Our flagship program that brings hands-on STEM experiences to girls across Bolivia, breaking barriers and creating opportunities.

home_testimonials.quote_1: Chicas Waskiris changed my daughter's perspective about science. Now she dreams of being an engineer!
home_testimonials.quote_2: The workshops helped me discover my passion for technology. I'm now studying computer science thanks to this program.

home.home_help_donate_desc: Your contribution helps us reach more girls and create more opportunities in STEM.
home.home_help_volunteer_desc: Share your knowledge and become a mentor for our participants.
home.home_help_partner_desc: Companies and organizations can support our mission in multiple ways.
home.home_news_event_desc: Join us for our annual STEM fair where participants showcase their projects.
home.home_news_blog_desc: We're bringing our programs to 5 new communities this year.
home.WHY_CHOOSE_US_SUBTITLE: We are transforming STEM education for girls in Bolivia
home.WHY_CHOOSE_1_DESC: Hands-on STEM experiences that inspire creativity and problem-solving skills.
home.WHY_CHOOSE_2_DESC: A network of students, teachers and families working together for success.
home.WHY_CHOOSE_3_DESC: Focus on values, leadership and personal growth alongside technical skills.
home.WHY_CHOOSE_4_DESC: Programs designed for girls with different abilities and backgrounds.
home.WHY_CHOOSE_VIDEO_CAPTION: Watch our story and see the impact we're making
home.WHY_CHOOSE_CTA_TITLE: Join and be the protagonist of your own future!
home.here_to_help: We're here to help. Contact us through any of our channels.
home.terms_welcome: Welcome to the Chicas Waskiris website ("the Website", "we", "our", "us"). By accessing or using this website, you agree to comply with the following Terms of Use. If you do not agree with these terms, please do not use this website.
home.terms_content_text: All content on this Website, including but not limited to photos, videos, text, manuals, guides, and other materials, is the property of Chicas Waskiris or is used with express authorization in accordance with applicable law.
home.terms_minors_content: The Website may publish images or videos of minors strictly with the required permissions duly managed by Chicas Waskiris. It is expressly prohibited to download, distribute, share outside the Website, reproduce, or modify such material without the prior written consent of Chicas Waskiris.
home.terms_use_materials: Use of Chicas Waskiris Authored Materials
home.terms_use_materials_text: Manuals, guides, and other digital resources from the Website may be downloaded free of charge, provided that:
home.terms_citation_required: Any reuse, publication, dissemination, adaptation, or public reference must properly cite Chicas Waskiris as the author and include visible acknowledgment of ownership with the wording "Chicas Waskiris, Bolivia" and a link to the Website.
home.terms_no_commercial: No commercial use is permitted, unless prior written agreement is obtained from Chicas Waskiris.
home.terms_no_modification: The original content must not be modified in a way that distorts its meaning or purpose.
home.terms_improper_use_text: You may not use the Website for unlawful, fraudulent, defamatory, abusive, obscene, or otherwise harmful purposes, nor may you interfere with its proper functioning.
home.terms_minors_protection_text: Downloading, sharing, reproducing, or redistributing images or videos of minors published on this Website for any purposes not expressly authorized by Chicas Waskiris is strictly prohibited. All photographs and videos on the Website have the required permissions; any third-party use is strictly forbidden.
home.terms_modifications_text: Chicas Waskiris reserves the right to modify these terms at any time without prior notice. Continued use of the Website constitutes acceptance of any modified terms.
home.privacy_no_cookies_text: Our Website does NOT use cookies to track or store personal information for any purpose.
home.privacy_no_auto_collect: We do not automatically collect personal information from visitors to our Website.
home.privacy_voluntary_info: We only receive personal information if you voluntarily provide it to us via contact forms, email, or other similar means.
home.privacy_info_use: In such cases, the information will only be used to respond directly to your inquiry and will not be shared with third parties without your prior consent, except when required by law.
home.privacy_minors_text: The Website publishes images and videos of minors with all required legal permissions and authorizations. No personal information is collected from minor visitors nor is any registration requested.
home.privacy_third_party_text: This Website may contain links to third-party websites. We are not responsible for the privacy practices or content on those external websites.
home.privacy_intellectual_text: All original downloadable materials (manuals, guides, and other resources) are the intellectual property of Chicas Waskiris.
home.privacy_reuse_conditions: Any reuse must always acknowledge Chicas Waskiris as the author and is not permitted for commercial purposes without express authorization.
home.privacy_policy_changes_text: Chicas Waskiris may amend this privacy policy whenever deemed necessary. Any changes will be posted on this page.
home.privacy_contact_text: For any inquiries regarding these Terms of Use or the Privacy Policy, please contact us at:

about.who_we_are_description: Chicas Waskiris is a Bolivian organization committed to the integral development of girls, adolescents, teachers and families in the field of STEM areas. Our mission is to promote innovative, inclusive and transformative educational experiences that combine scientific, digital and emotional skills, building a community passionate about continuous learning.
about.our_vision_description: We want to be leaders in STEM teaching and learning in Bolivia, inspiring more young people -especially adolescents and girls- to discover scientific and technological careers. We form a network of mentors, teachers and families committed to innovation and the development of female talents in science and technology.
about.our_mission_description: To promote innovative, inclusive and transformative educational experiences that combine scientific, digital and emotional skills, building a community passionate about continuous learning.
about.value_innovation_description: Creative and updated methodologies for effective and motivating learning.
about.value_inclusion_description: New experiences and equal opportunities and closing gender gaps.
about.value_collaboration_description: Strong support networks that strengthen our educational community.
about.value_integrity_description: Social responsibility and solid principles in everything we do.
about.value_curiosity_description: Love for knowledge and constant exploration of the world around us.
about.value_excellence_description: Constant training and modern methodologies for the best learning.
about.our_commitment_description: We work every day so that more Bolivian girls and adolescents discover their potential, overcome stereotypes and access real opportunities in STEM areas. We believe that the future belongs to those who dare to learn, create and lead. Our contents are designed to be attractive, brief and motivating, aligned with the mission, vision and values of Chicas Waskiris, ready to capture the attention of donors, allies and beneficiaries.
about.coordination_subtitle: Meet the leaders who make our mission possible
about.casiana_description: Casiana Quispe Nina is Co-General Coordinator of Chicas Waskiris. Licensed in Biochemistry from Universidad Mayor de San Andrés, she has diplomas in higher education and a master's degree in Biological and Biomedical Sciences. She works as a university professor and since the beginning of the organization has been committed to inspiring young women and adolescents to pursue STEM careers. She firmly believes that the potential of each young person exists and only needs to be supported to flourish.
about.cta_description: Join our community and be part of the change we want to see in Bolivia. Together we build a more inclusive future full of opportunities in STEM.

projects.hero_description: At Chicas Waskiris we develop innovative programs and projects that impact the lives of girls and adolescents in Bolivia, especially in rural communities and groups traditionally excluded from the STEM field. Each initiative seeks to inspire, empower and open new opportunities through education, inclusion and collaborative work.
projects.stem_hands_objective: Promote the inclusion of deaf adolescents in STEM education, adapting educational materials and workshops to Bolivian Sign Language (LSB) and generating accessible and transformative experiences.
projects.stem_hands_achievement_1: Initial training in LSB for the Chicas Waskiris team, in alliance with Effetá, a reference in educational inclusion for deaf people.
projects.stem_hands_achievement_2: Adaptation of didactic materials and experiment manuals to LSB.
projects.stem_hands_achievement_3: Acquisition of equipment and resources (microscopes, projectors, cutting plotter and others) for practical and accessible workshops.
projects.stem_hands_achievement_4: First pilot workshops with deaf adolescents in La Paz and projection of replication in Santa Cruz, Bolivia.
projects.stem_hands_achievement_5: Creation of project visual identity and inclusive materials.
projects.stem_hands_impact: STEM In Your Hands marks a milestone in inclusive STEM education in Bolivia, opening paths for more adolescents with disabilities to access quality scientific and technological experiences.
projects.mentors_objective: Strengthen leadership and STEM skills of adolescents through a mentoring network between young women and girls interested in science and technology.
projects.mentors_achievement_1: More than 90 tutors and 100 apprentices participated in the program.
projects.mentors_achievement_2: Mentoring sessions, workshops and collaborative activities to enhance STEM talents and vocations.
projects.mentors_achievement_3: Creation of a community of support and growth among peers.
projects.mentors_impact: The program has boosted confidence, leadership and interest in STEM careers in dozens of girls and young women from different regions of the country.
projects.impulsa_objective: Motivate adolescents from municipalities and/or cities far from the city of La Paz to opt for STEM careers, reducing the gender gap and generating opportunities from their own communities.
projects.impulsa_achievement_1: Implementation of STEM workshops, teacher training and psychopedagogical support.
projects.impulsa_achievement_2: Positive changes in participants' intention to choose STEM careers.
projects.impulsa_achievement_3: Generation of evidence for public policies with a gender and inclusion approach.
projects.impulsa_impact: Impulsa STEM transformed rural young women's perception of their future, showing that talent and passion for science have no borders.
projects.juntucha_virtual_objective: Offer immersive and fun STEM experiences to girls and adolescents from across the country, through inclusive virtual camps.
projects.juntucha_virtual_achievement_1: Two virtual editions with more than 100 scholarship recipients per camp.
projects.juntucha_virtual_achievement_2: Interactive activities, experiments and scientific challenges adapted to virtuality.
projects.juntucha_virtual_achievement_3: National network of curious, creative and connected girls.
projects.juntucha_virtual_impact: The Juntucha Waskiris camps have been a seedbed for scientific and technological vocations, creating bonds of friendship and collaboration between girls from different regions.
projects.first_camp_objective: Provide Bolivian adolescents with a practical and experiential experience in science, technology, engineering and mathematics.
projects.first_camp_achievement_1: Realization of the first in-person STEM camp in Cochabamba, Bolivia aimed at female adolescent students.
projects.first_camp_achievement_2: 100 scholarship recipients participated in workshops, experiments and leadership activities.
projects.first_camp_impact: This camp was the starting point of the Chicas Waskiris community, sowing the first seeds of passion in female adolescents for STEM areas in Bolivia.
projects.founding_moment: The founding moment of Chicas Waskiris
projects.cta_title: Every project is an opportunity to transform lives!
projects.cta_description: Every project is an opportunity to transform lives and build a more inclusive, diverse and scientific future for Bolivia! If you want to be part of this change, support us or learn more about our upcoming initiatives.

impact.hero_description: At Chicas Waskiris, every number tells a story of change, inclusion and empowerment. Thanks to the support of funding institutions, allies and volunteers, we have achieved:
impact.stat_girls_description: Directly impacted through STEM programs and camps since 2019.
impact.stat_scholarships_description: For in-person and virtual camps throughout Bolivia.
impact.stat_mentors_description: Trained in leadership and STEM support.
impact.stat_teachers_description: In inclusive methodologies and STEM teaching.
impact.stat_deaf_description: With materials and workshops adapted to Bolivian Sign Language (LSB) in 2024-2025.
impact.stat_alliances_description: With educational institutions, inclusion organizations and international cooperation.
impact.stat_publications_description: Innovative and freely accessible, for teachers and students throughout the country.
impact.video_juntucha_description: Immersive and fun STEM experiences for girls and adolescents from across the country through inclusive virtual camps.
impact.video_first_camp_description: The founding moment of Chicas Waskiris, where 100 scholarship recipients participated in workshops, experiments and leadership activities in Cochabamba.
impact.inclusion_description: We create spaces where every girl, regardless of her abilities or background, can shine in STEM.
impact.empowerment_description: We strengthen the confidence and leadership of girls and adolescents so they become agents of change.
impact.future_description: We build bridges to STEM careers, breaking stereotypes and opening new possibilities.
impact.cta_description: Every success story is possible thanks to people like you who believe in the potential of Bolivian girls.

MEDIA.hero_description: Discover our publications, videos and resources that document the impact and transformation we generate in Bolivian communities.
MEDIA.publication_1_description: Results and achievements reached during our work with rural and urban communities.
MEDIA.publication_2_description: Manual of pedagogical tools for STEM education with a gender approach.
MEDIA.publication_3_description: Testimonials and success stories from girls who have participated in our programs.
MEDIA.video_local_description: Learn about the story and mission of Chicas Waskiris through this emotional promotional video.
MEDIA.video_youtube_description: Relive the highlights of our first STEM camp in 2019.
MEDIA.cta_description: Help us reach more people by sharing our content and educational resources.

GET_INVOLVED.hero_description: Join our mission to transform lives through STEM education. There are multiple ways to support and be part of the change we want to see in Bolivia.
GET_INVOLVED.stories_description: Each project, each workshop and each publication is an open door for more girls and adolescents to discover their potential and become leaders of change in Bolivia.
GET_INVOLVED.stories_cta: Join us and be part of this transformative impact!
GET_INVOLVED.gallery_cta_description: Explore our complete gallery with photos, testimonials and special moments from our programs and workshops.
GET_INVOLVED.donation_description: Make your donation and be part of the change.
